short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate strong, secure passwords easily with Simple Password Generator, a user-friendly Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Generate strong and secure passwords with just a few clicks.
- Choose your desired password length for optimal security.
- Passwords always include at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character for enhanced security.
- Quickly copy generated passwords for seamless use.
- Lightweight and easy-to-use.
- Simple and minimalistic design.
- Free to use with no ads or in-app purchases.
